price: Ní ọjọ́ tí wọ́n máa kó àwọn ọ̀tá Allāhu jọ síbi Iná, wọn yó sì kó àwọn ẹni àkọ́kọ́ wọn papọ̀ mọ́ àwọn ẹni ìkẹ́yìn wọn
arabic: وَيَوۡمَ يُحۡشَرُ أَعۡدَآءُ ٱللَّهِ إِلَى ٱلنَّارِ فَهُمۡ يُوزَعُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wayawma yuḥ'sharu aʿdāu al-lahi ilā al-nāri fahum yūzaʿūna
